title: Lab Assignments
text:
Site overview
This site contains Lab assignments and their solutions.


Lab 1
In this lab you may learn about the following topics:

Introduction to R
Arithmetic operations
Vectors
Further operations with vectors
First steps in plotting

You may try first or proceed straight to solutions Lab 1 - Solutions


Lab 2
In this lab you may learn about the following topics:

Probability distributions in R: general structures
Exponential distribution
Gamma distribution
Normal and log-normal distributions
Tou will also learn about set.seed function

You may try first or proceed straight to solutions Lab 2 - Solutions


Lab 3
In this lab you may learn about the following topics:

Weibull distribution
Pareto distribution
How to define a function in R
How to use an external package
Loops

You may try first or proceed straight to Lab 3 - Solutions


Lab 4
In this lab you may learn about the following topics:

How to create data frame
How to load an external data frame
How to access the data from a data frame
How to filter a data frame
How to recognise linear dependence between data sets
How to fit data into a distribution using MLE

You may try first or proceed straight to Lab 4 - Solutions


Lab 5
In this lab you may learn about the following topics:

How to calculate the Kaplan-Meier estimate for the survival function
How to plot the estimate for all data and for the values of a covariate
How to use the legend of a plot
How to calculate the estimators for the Cox regression model

You may try first or proceed straight to Lab 5 - Solutions




 Back to top
